TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PostTestAttribute extends NUnit.Framework.NUnitAttribute

Docs.summary: Attribute used to mark a class that contains one-time SetUp and/or TearDown methods that apply to all the tests in a namespace or an assembly.
